friday.title: Nakoki kosalisa yo na nini?
friday.welcome: Boyei malamu na mokolo ya mitano, mosungi na yo ya AI!
friday.prompt: Tuna ngai eloko to banda mosala ya sika.
friday.help: Ozali na mposa ya lisalisi? Nazali awa mpo na kotambwisa bino.

dashboard.recent-activity: Mosala oyo euti kosalema kala mingi te .

errors.generic: Eloko moko ekendeki mabe. Svp bomeka lisusu.
errors.unauthorized: Ozali na ndingisa te ya kosala likambo oyo.
errors.invalid-input: Svp tala entrée na yo pe meka lisusu.
errors.network: Libunga ya réseau. Tosɛngi yo otala boyokani na yo.

tooltips.new-project: Bandá mosala ya sika mpo na kobongisa misala na yo.
tooltips.automation-run: Bosala automation oyo pona ko exécuter ba tâches pré-définies.
tooltips.library-search: Boluka ba modèles, ba scripts, to ba ensembles ya ba données.
tooltips.space-invite: Benga ba membres ya équipe ba collaborer na espace oyo.

footer.copyright: © 2025 Mokolo ya mitano AI. Makoki nyonso mazali ya moto ye moko.
footer.privacy: Politiki ya kobatela makambo ya moto ye moko .
